name: A Peculiar Adventure On Bast
description:
One otherwise ordinary day, on two opposite sides of the continent, Walt, a door to door salesman, and Aldar, the great Emperor, decide their lives need a change. In Walt's case, he wants to achieve something much greater - that something being his coin purse, and he's planning, no, scheming the perfect job of questionable legality. Aldar on the other hand wants to do what every unaging being with mysterious etheric powers locked away in their palace wants to do - go for a simple stroll through the streets.

Through solving head scratching puzzles, meeting eccentric characters and traversing vibrant hand-drawn areas in pursuit of their own goals, they will uncover a great secret that will intertwine their fates - that's just how these things go.



  • Explore the steampunk world of Bast and it's many colorful locations
  • Follow the two playable characters and discover how their fates intertwine
  • Solve many logical puzzles, from traditional point-and-click ones, to brain teasers and mini-games
  • Pick the game mode you enjoy most - story or challenge
  • Enjoy fully hand-drawn characters, items and backgrounds
  • Listen to the beautiful music and the voiced dialogue
